title: Man, child injured in shooting in Lake Highlands
content:
A man and child were injured Friday during an exchange of gunfire in Lake Highlands.
The incident occurred about 3:30 p.m. in the 9700 block of West Ferris Branch Boulevard, not far from Interstate 635. Witnesses told police that a man shot into a crowd during a physical altercation, injuring the child.
Another man in the crowd then fired back, hitting the initial shooter, police said.
Both were hospitalized with non-life-threatening injuries.
Police are investigating the incident.
